basics.name: Spencer R. Keyser
basics.label: Ecologist
basics.summary: I am an ecologist focusing on the drivers of biodiversity across large-scales.

education.institution: University of Texas Marine Science Institute, Port Aransas, Texas

Professional Appointments.name: K. Lisa Yang Center for Conservation Bioacoustics, Cornell Lab of Ornithology, Cornell University
Professional Appointments.summary: Teaching at Palmer Physical Laboratory (now 302 Frist Campus Center). While not a professor at Princeton, I associated with the physics professors and continued to give lectures on campus.

Peer-review Publications.title: Seasonality structures avian functional diversity and niche packing across North America.
Peer-review Publications.authors: Keyser, S.R., Pauli, J.N., Fink, D., Radeloff, V.C., Pigot, A.L., B., Zuckerberg

Contributed Presentations (Oral).title: Seasonal patterns and drivers of North American functional diversity.
Contributed Presentations (Oral).organization: American Ornithological Society-Society for Canadian Ornthologists Joint Conference
